thread.title: Wilson's Tyra Ott gets another district tennis title with win over Notre Dame's Coco Chen
thread.title_full: Wilson's Tyra Ott gets another district tennis title with win over Notre Dame's Coco Chen

title: Wilson's Tyra Ott gets another district tennis title with win over Notre Dame's Coco Chen
text:
By Josh Folck | For lehighvalleylive.com on October 12, 2015 4:51 PM, updated October 12, 2015 5:22 PM View/Post Comments 
Tyra Ott (Wilson) def. Coco Chen (Notre Dame) 6-3, 6-4 â€” Rapid Recap 
Wilson junior Tyra Ott defeated Notre Dame senior Coco Chen 6-3, 6-4 in the District 11 Class AA final for the second straight year on Monday afternoon at Lehigh University. It was the third straight title for Ott. 
Turning point : After Chen came back from 4-1 down to even things in the second set, Ott won the next two games to clinch the hard-fought match. 
What it means : It's another district title for Ott, who will look to successfully defend her state title on November 6 in Hershey. Chen held leads in a much more competitive match than last season's 6-2, 6-0 victory for Ott in the final.
